Hi Lindell Harry,    Hello, as replies over the weekend may be delayed, here is some information:    The pedals can be manually updated or reverted to an older firmware version via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → Firmware → pedals-plusx-old.sfu.    Regarding USB disconnections, please plug the pedals directly into the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your computer and avoid using a USB hub, as this issue is usually caused by insufficient power.    Also, please ensure that both your computer and the base are properly grounded, meaning the plug or power strip should be connected to a three-prong wall outlet.

Hi Lindell Harry,  If it shows “disconnected” and the firmware cannot be updated, please follow the steps below to update it.      Please follow the steps below:  1. Enter Firmware Upgrade Mode    Press and hold the “Upgrade” button on the PlusX control box;    While holding the button, reinsert the USB cable;    Release the button once the software shows “Entered Firmware Upgrade Mode”.    2. Manually Restore Firmware    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update;    Select the firmware file path: pedals-firmware-pedals-plusx.sfu or plusx-old.sfu;    Wait for the upgrade to complete, then reinsert the USB and test the pedals again.

Can you send me a copy of the firmware I uninstalled and reinstalled
Simsonn Manager? So think the .old file has been deleted.
